LanguageData.RR.EnergyNeedDescription: Energy is the amount of retained charge output from the internal reactor. If it is hits zero, the persona will enter an inefficient low-power mode. If charge is not restored, hardware will eventually critically malfunction, and the persona will cease functioning.
LanguageData.RR.LowEnergySelfShutdown: {PAWN_nameDef} is in self-shutdown from low energy.
LanguageData.RR.MemoryNeedDescription: Memory is the amount of time between each system defragment. Advanced units must regularly enter a semi-comatose state to purge useless info from their persona cores to avoid memory overloads. If they go too long without it, they will involuntarily hibernate until excess memory is purged.
LanguageData.RR.MustBeCapableToRepair: {1_labelShort} must be capable of smithing to make repairs.
LanguageData.RR.SynthNotGenetic: Synthetic pawns do not carry a genetic code.
LanguageData.RR.SynthCannotBeScanned: Synthetic pawns do not have viable neuro-patterns.
